document.full_text: a mortgage broker who secretly recorded two friends accused of trying to cover up one of the biggest u.s. insider trading cases on record pleaded guilty to involvement in the 17-year scheme.
document.title: accused middleman admits guilt in u.s. insider case
lines_and_colors: a mortgage broker who secretly recorded two friends accused of trying to cover up one of the biggest u.s. insider trading cases on record pleaded guilty to involvement in the 17-year scheme.
